description.en:
Kei, driven by the love for his childhood friend Minamo, just got into the prestigious Kougaoka Academy, and together they serve on the school’s public morals committee. Kei wants to let Minamo know about his true feelings but is crushed to hear that the school has a no-date policy! His dreams of a happy relationship trampled, Kei is called into a meeting with Ren, the beautiful leader of the committee, along with her two divine subordinates. They know Kei’s real desire and can’t have a rule breaker in their midsts, but Kei knows that if he suppresses his emotions for Minamo, they’ll build up and explode one day! Luckily the public morals enforcers are ready to quell his desires, but what if that’s not enough?

•1. Change My Life!  
•2. Ochiten no Yo! (Night of Falling / I've Fallen!)
•3-5. Fuuki no Midare! (Corruption of Morals!)
•6. Maikon (Under Mind Control)
•7. Act Like Friend  
•8. Kosutte Daisakusen (Mission Cos-Play)
•9. Aneshibori (Sister-Milking)
•10. Joukyou Daigaku Monogatari (Journey to Tokyo College)
•11. Blackened  
•12. Fuuki no Midare!: After Days (Disruption of Morals!: After Days)

**FEMALE** big ass, big breasts, bloomers, blowjob, cheating, cousin, defloration, glasses, impregnation, lactation, maid, milf, mind control, mind break, nakadashi, netorare, nurse, paizuri, pregnant, schoolgirl uniform
